para.text: The following elements are available in a deployment diagram.

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Symbol; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none;

para.text: In order to create Package in deployment diagram,

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Click at the position where package will be placed in the

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: At the quick dialog, enter package name and press

para.text: A node is a run-time physical object that represents a computational resource, generally having at least a memory and often processing capability as well, and upon which components may be deployed.
In order to create Node in deployment diagram,

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Click at the position where Node will be placed in the

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Then node is created and the quick dialog appears. Enter the node name at the quick dialog.

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

para.text: In order to add deployed component to node

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: , you can add deployed component by using

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: dialog, select deployed component. To select component, you have already made some component.

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: And click OK button. Then deployed component is added to the node.

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: The node is shown as following.

para.text: In order to add deployed artifact to node,

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: , you can add deployed artifact by using

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: dialog, select a deployed artifact and click

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Then the artifact is add to the node and the node is shown as following.

para.text: In order to create port on a node,

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Click the node where the port will be contained in the

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: A port is created on the node and the quick dialog appears. Enter the port name at the quick dialog.

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: key. The result is like the following.

para.text: In order to create part on a node

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Click the node where the part will be contained in the

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Finally, a part is created on the node as following.

para.text: In order to create connector between two parts,

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Drag from one part and drop to the other part in the

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

para.text: A node instance is an instance of a node. A collection of component instances may reside on the node instance.
In order to create NodeInstance in deployment diagram,

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Click at the position where NodeInstance will be placed in the
, a node is created, and quick dialog appears.
Enter the node instance name at the quick dialog and press

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

para.text: Procedure for adding attribute link to node instance
There are two way to add attribute link to node instance.

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Symbol; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none;

para.text: In the case of using NodeInstance model

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: popup menu, and you can add Attribute Link.

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none;
li.text: The node doesn't show attribute link on the view.

li.text: , you can add attribute link by using

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Click at the position where Artifact will be placed in the
At the quick dialog, enter the artifact name and press

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Drag and drop between elements in the

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Then dependency between two elements is created as follows.

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;
text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Drag from one NodeInstance and drop to the other NodeInstance in the

list.style: text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Then the link between two node instances is created.
